title: Automated Test Validation Framework
description: Implement a comprehensive test validation system that automatically verifies test coverage, execution results, and quality metrics to ensure reliable software delivery.
iWant: an automated test validation framework that checks test coverage and execution quality
soThat: I can ensure comprehensive testing and catch issues before production deployment
acceptanceCriteria: System validates minimum 80% code coverage across all modules
Framework executes unit, integration, and e2e tests automatically
Test results are aggregated into a single dashboard with pass/fail metrics
Failed tests trigger immediate notifications to assigned developers
System generates detailed test reports with execution time and coverage data
